item.description:
What better way to start of a new year than with a Rose Bowl game!!??:) My alma mater, STANFORD plays Wisconsin in the 99th Annual Rose Bowl.  Come on down and watch all the action on one of BP many tvs!

There are FOUR other Bowl games that start at 1:00pm so feel free to come a little early for even MORE college football action! Rose Bowl kick off is at 5:10pm.  Come early to get a good seat! Battery Park will be having their "Hangover Brunch" available until 5:00pm including their bloody mary bar!

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District in Boston.  It's within walking distance of Blue Line (State and Government Center), Orange Line (State), Green Line (Gov't Center), and a short walk to Red Line (Park Street).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO.

Hope to see you there! -Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in my STANFORD gear! GO CARDINAL!
item.name: 99th Rose Bowl -- Wisconsin vs. Stanford NEW YEAR'S DAY
